dcterms:creator: G. Widmer
M. Kubat
dcterms:description: The stagger dataset is defined in a simple block-world with three nominal attributes: size, color, and shape. The hidden target concept switches between three definitions, resulting in extreme concept drift.
dcterms:title: Stagger Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a well-known benchmarking dataset for digits recognition, consisting of grayscale images of handwritten digits resized to 8x8 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST-digits Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Coraddu
L. Oneto
A. Ghio
S. Savio
D. Anguita
M. Figari
dcterms:description: The Naval Propulsion dataset is a real-world dataset collected for machine-learning driven condition-based maintenance models, containing sensor readings and parameters related to the health of naval propulsion plants.
dcterms:title: Naval Propulsion Dataset
